00055 template <class Alloc = std::allocator<detail::digit_t>, bool Threadsafe = true,
00056     bool Secure = false>
00057 class integer_t: private detail::digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>,
00058     public any_integer
00059 {
00060     public:
00061     typedef integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> type;
00062 
00065     integer_t();
00066     integer_t(const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& b);
00067     integer_t(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) b): any_integer(*this, 1) { _swap(b); }
00068     explicit integer_t(const char *str, size_t base = 10);
00069     explicit integer_t(const char *str, char **endptr, size_t base = 10);
00070     explicit integer_t(const std::string& str, size_t base = 10);
00071     explicit integer_t(const xint::binary_t b, size_t bits = 0);
00072     explicit integer_t(const any_integer& other);
00073     template <typename Type> integer_t(const Type n,
00074         typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type* = 0);
00075 
00076     #ifndef BOOST_XINT_DOXYGEN_IGNORE
00077 
00078     integer_t(const detail::data_t c): detail::digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00079         Secure>(*c.holder()), any_integer(*this, c.length, c.negative) {
00080         data.beginendmod(); }
00081     #endif
00082 
00083 
00092     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(
00093         type) c);
00094     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator=(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) c) {
00095         _swap(c); return *this; }
00096     template <typename Type> integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator=(
00097         const Type n) { integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nn(n); _swap(nn);
00098         return *this; }
00099 
00100     bool operator!() const { return data.is_zero(); }
00101     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> operator-() const;
00102     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator+() { return *this; }
00103     const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator+() const { return
00104         *this; }
00105

00107         Threadsafe, Secure> b);

00109         Threadsafe, Secure> b);

00111         Threadsafe, Secure> b);

00113         Threadsafe, Secure> b);

00115         Threadsafe, Secure> b);

00120     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>  operator--(int);

00133 
00136     bool is_odd() const;
00137     bool is_even() const;
00138     int  sign(bool signed_zero = false) const;
00139     size_t hex_digits() const;
00141 
00142     typedef base_divide_t<integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> > divide_t;
00143 
00151 
00152     static integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> pow2(size_t exponent);
00153     static integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> factorial(size_t n);
00154     template <class Type> static integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
00155         random_by_size(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, bool high_bit_on = false,
00156         bool low_bit_on = false, bool can_be_negative = false);
00157     template <class Type> static integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
00158         random_prime(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, callback_t callback =
00159         no_callback);
00161 
00162     void _swap(integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& s) { using std::swap;
00163         swap(data, s.data); }
00164 
00165     private:
00166     BOOST_XINT_COPYABLE_AND_MOVABLE(type)
00167 };

00319 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00320 template <typename Type> integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::integer_t(const
00321     Type n, typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type*):
00322     any_integer(*this, 1)
00323 {
00324     if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00325     else data.set_unsigned(n);
00326 }

00643 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00644 template <class Type>
00645 integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00646     Secure>::random_by_size(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, bool high_bit_on,
00647     bool low_bit_on, bool can_be_negative)
00648 {
00649     detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00650 
00651     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00652     detail::random_by_size(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, high_bit_on,
00653         low_bit_on, can_be_negative);
00654     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00655 }

00688 {

00691     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;

00713 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00714 integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> abs(const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00715     Secure> n)
00716 {
00717     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(abs(n._data()));
00718     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

00738 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00739 typename integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::divide_t divide(const
00740     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> dividend, const integer_t<Alloc,
00741     Threadsafe, Secure> divisor)
00742 {
00743     typename integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::divide_t r;
00744     divide(r.quotient._data(), r.remainder._data(), dividend._data(),
00745         divisor._data());
00746     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00747 }

01173 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01174 integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> operator+(const integer_t<Alloc,
01175     Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n2)

01189 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01190 integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> operator-(const integer_t<Alloc,

01386 #define BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(rtype, op) \
01387     template <class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename N> \
01388     rtype op(const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const N n2) { \
01389         return op(n1, integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n2)); \
01390     } \
01391     \
01392     template <typename N, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> \
01393     rtype op(const N n1, const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n2) { \
01394         return op(integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n1), n2); \
01395     }

01406 #define BOOST_XINT_ANY_MATH(op) \
01407     template <class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename N> \
01408     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> op(const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, \
01409         Secure> n1, const N n2) \
01410     { \
01411         integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(op(n1, integer_t<Alloc, \
01412             Threadsafe, Secure>(n2))); \
01413         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
01414     } \
01415     \
01416     template <typename N, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> \
01417     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> op(const N n1, const integer_t<Alloc, \
01418         Threadsafe, Secure> n2) \
01419     { \
01420         integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(op(integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, \
01421             Secure>(n1), n2)); \
01422         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
01423     }

01462     Threadsafe, Secure>& right)
